description: Ms. codex. Title from title page (fol. 1a). 25 to 31 lines per page. Written in a casual medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. European glazed paper with watermark. Fol. 56a-b: Blank. Short text on the pastedown of the upper cover. Several inscriptions, including ownership statements on fol. 2a. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals (counting the first fly-leaf as fol. 1). Label with the mention "taṣawwuf [...] 48" in Arabic script on the upper cover. Label with the mention "916Ḥ" in Arabic script on the pastedown of the upper cover. Copied? in 873 (fol. 145b). Incipit: بسم ... الحمد لله كاشف القلوب والابصار وواهب المعارف والاسرار وصلى الله ... اما بعد فاعلم ايها الاخ الصادق وفقنا الله واياك الى تحقيق الحقائق Explicit: ربنا لا تزغ قلوبنا بعد اذ هديتنا وهب لنا من لدنك رحمة انك انت الوهاب حسبنا الله ونعم الوكيل نعم المولى ونعم النصير وصلى الله على سيدنا محمد وآله وصحبه وذريته امين
author: Khūyī, Muḥammad ibn Quṭb al-Dīn, active 15th century
abstract: Commentary on al-Nuṣūṣ fī taḥqīq al-ṭawr al-makhṣūṣ by Ṣadr al-Dīn al-Qūnawī (d. 672/1273), completed on Sunday 18 Shaʻbān 856 (colophon, fol. 145b).
extent: i, 144, i leaves : paper ; 210 x 145 (168 x 116) mm. bound to 210 x 145 mm.
provenance: Ownership statement dated 1123 H. on fol. 2a. Waqf statement on fol. 2b, repeated on fol. 10b. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
dlme_provenance_en: Ownership statement dated 1123 H. on fol. 2a. Waqf statement on fol. 2b, repeated on fol. 10b. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.

خويي، محمد بن قطب الدين

subject: Ṣadr al-Dīn al-Qūnawī, Muḥammad ibn Isḥāq, d. 1273 or 4.—Nuṣūṣ.
